data.title: Programs to convert
data.meta_description: Hi all I am writing because I'm looking for a program Windows (if possible freeware) to convert a lot of .flv file to .avi or .mpg, maybe that automatically choose the best setting.
data.text:
Hi all

I am writing because I'm looking for a program Windows (if possible freeware) to convert a lot of .flv file to .avi or .mpg, maybe that automatically choose the best setting.

I've already tried but:

Aimersoft Video Converter works but it's not free

Any Video Converter create a speed up video with an audio not synchronized

Aone FLV to AVI MPEG WMV 3GP MP4 iPod Converter V4.2 creates audio not synchronized with the video

Avidemux creates audio not synchronized with the video

AVS Video Converter works but is not free

BitComet FLV Converter 1.0 creates audio not synchronized with the video

Clone2go Free Video Converter create a speed up video with an audio not synchronized

ConvertxtoDVD creates audio not synchronized with the video

Cool Free MOV MPEG4 ASF iPod AVI DIVX FLV Converter says error on reading

Download Helper for Firefox does non convert video offline

Free 3GP Video Converter not works

Free FLV Converter 1.3 is very slow

Internet Video Converter says incompatible video

Isquint does not exist for windows

Koyote Free FLV Converter creates audio not synchronized with the video

Media Coder give me an error like "incorrect parameters for lame mp3"

media-convert.com is too slow (is only online)

mediaconverter.org is too slow (is only online)

Moyea FLV to Video Converter Pro 2 says error code is 106

Nero Recode v2.2.6.17c is not compatible with Windows Vista

Pazera Free FLV to AVI Converter, audio is not synchronized with the video

Quick Media Converter creates audio not synchronized with the video

Riva Encoder convert only one file at time

Simple Mencoder Shell GUI create a speed up video with an audio not synchronized

Sorenson Squeeze 5 requires quick time

Super gives me a System incompatibility error

SWF & FLV Toolbox creates audio not synchronized with the video

Total Video Converter, audio is not synchronized with the video

vconversion.com is too slow (is only online)

VDownloader creates audio not synchronized with the video.

VideoGet does non convert video offline

Visualhub does not exist for Windows

vixy.net does non convert video offline

VLC Free Video Converter create a speed up video with an audio not synchronized

WinAVI FLV Converter creates a file avi great one only second

WinFF creates audio not synchronized with the video

Wondershare Video Converter works but is not free

Xilisoft Video Converter, audio is not synchronized with the video

zamzar.com is too slow (is only online)

Does someone has an idea to convert them in the right way?

Thank you.

__________________

You have never see gift ideas like these! (idee regalo on italian facolt√† medicina forum)

0
